Summary: witnessed the same object the night before on the 16/8/12 same object tonight and exactly the same characteristics as last night appears to move extremely slow but almost hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Pelican
There were no other sightings in Pelican on or around July 17th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was at home and looked up at the sky to see if there was any clouds in the sky as the wind had suddenly stopped i was looking in the same direction as we saw the object the night before only tonight it was closer to my house i first saw it at 6.30pm and im still watching it now it has moved slightly from where it was and appears to be hovering at the moment i can see the shape more now you can see the outline better and the lights change less frequently the object looks as though its waiting for something its very strange
